author: doogie
msg: There is a race condition during shutdown, where the ofbiz java process
is no longer up, and responding to status requests, but the jsvc process
that managed the pid file has not yet stopped.  This means that the
existance test of the pidfile may succeed, but the removal of the
pidfile will fail, as the jsvc process itself removes it.  So, do a
forced removal, which then allows the rm to succeed, and the init script

author: doogie
msg: When compiling, don't include the ant runtime classes; this makes the
compiled output more stable, and not depending on any random included
ant support libs.  If any are needed, they need to be explicitly added.

author: mikedd
msg: rollback rev 1038109 which caused problems with xmlstore module

author: fuankg
msg: Some more casts to make MSVC calm ...
